workflows.name: dashboards
workflows.label: Dashboards & Visualizations
workflows.description: Dashboards and indices that enable you to easily visualize important metrics.

workflows.name: Quick Start
workflows.description: This is a java-client fluent-bit based docker quick starting instructions tutorial with a live example

steps.name: Create docker-network
steps.label: Environment setting
steps.description: Before running any docker-compose files, create the opensearch-net network

steps.name: Setup java app folder
steps.label: Environment Parameters
steps.content:
mkdir -p java-app/src/main/java

wget -P java-app \
  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-catalog/main/integrations/observability/java_client/getting-started/java-app/Dockerfile

wget -P java-app \
  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-catalog/main/integrations/observability/java_client/getting-started/java-app/pom.xml

wget -P java-app/src/main/java \
  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-catalog/main/integrations/observability/java_client/getting-started/java-app/src/main/java/App.java

steps.name: Run docker-compose
steps.label: live container
steps.description: Run docker-compose for the java-client live example and see the generated index
steps.content: wget -O docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-catalog/main/integrations/observability/java_client/getting-started/docker-compose.yml && docker-compose up --build -d java-app fluent-bit

workflows.name: java-client
workflows.description: This is a fluent-bit based getting started instructions tutorial

steps.name: Import OpenSearch Java Client
steps.label: Client Import
steps.description: Import the OpenSearch module from the opensearchpy package

steps.name: Create Connection to OpenSearch
steps.label: Connection Establishment
steps.description: Establish a connection to your OpenSearch cluster by creating an instance of the OpenSearch class. Provide the necessary connection details, such as the host and port.

input-params.name: opensearch_host
input-params.description: Hostname or IP address of your OpenSearch server

input-params.name: opensearch_port
input-params.description: Port of your OpenSearch server (default is 9200)

steps.name: Indexing Logs
steps.label: Log Indexing
steps.description: Start indexing logs into OpenSearch. Indexing involves adding documents representing your log entries to OpenSearch.

schema.description: Setup applicative logs index template in the dev console

index-patterns.description: Import index patterns `.ndjson` file to the saved objects
